title: Life in a fishing village
brief_description: Scenes in the harbour and town of Gravarna, a fishing village on the west coast of Sweden, with emphasis on the importance of the fishing fleet to the activities of the entire village, and the part played by this community in the European fishing industry. Follows a young boy at school, at work and at play.
